description:
Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

Discover Lifestyle Rewards Tailored to You

Aura amplifies your every day, making sure the extraordinary is always within reach. Embrace a rewards programme that makes it rewarding to be you!

Enjoy personalised offers and exclusive rewards at an unrivalled collection of 70+ brands you love, from fashion to beauty, home furnishings to dining and more.

Earn and redeem points every time you shop or dine at brands including H&M, Debenhams, American Eagle, Foot Locker, Boots, Bath & Body Works, The Cheesecake Factory, P.F Chang's, Pottery Barn and many more.

Aura travels with you so that you can continue to earn and redeem points at participating brands across the UAE, Kuwait, Qatar and KSA.

With an Aura membership, you earn points on every purchase.  Move up the tiers from Aura Hello to Aura Star and Aura VIP as you earn points and access more benefits and personalised offers.

Floward is the #1 gift & flower shop with 100% fresh flowers guaranteed. Order online, for same-day gift & flower delivery to Nationwide. With Floward, sending flowers and gifts is as enjoyable as receiving them! Share the love and love yourself.



Floward is the ultimate online destination to order flowers and gifts for your loved ones for any occasion. Our fresh flowers and plants are sourced daily from the best growers, distinctively designed and arranged by our florists, and delivered via our fleet to ensure a long-lasting impression. 


Browse our beautiful flowers and exclusively designed floral arrangements. Enjoy a fabulous mix of flower bouquets and creative flower vases. Order your favourite flowers online and pamper yourself.


Download Floward's Flower delivery app and enjoy the following features:



     - Letterbox Flowers: Fresh cut flowers handpicked and packaged by our own talented florists. 
     - Flowers Subscription: New seasonal flower arrangements delivered every week/month. 
     - Personalised Calendar: Never miss an occasion when you use Floward's occasions calendar.
     - Free Personalised Video Card: Record a selfie video and we will add it to your card with just a few clicks.
     - Free Same-day gift & flower delivery: Save the day by sending last-minute flowers via our own fleet.
     - Loyalty Programme: Earn Floward's garden points with every purchase and redeem them later. 
     - No Address, No Problem: Send us the recipient's name and number and we will arrange your gift & flower delivery.
     - DIY Box: Floral arrangement is a therapeutic art practise, get creative and take time for yourself.
     - Variety of Flower Arrangements and Online Gifts including chocolate, teddy bears, cakes, balloons, plants, and much more.
     - Easy Payments: we accept international credit and debit cards.


Order flowers online and get them delivered to your loved ones anywhere in Nationwide.


Shop gifts and flowers for any occasion, such as Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Anniversary, Birthday, Sympathy, Get well, Thank you or surprise a person you love or reconnect with your friends and family.


Do you want to send flowers or buy a gift with beautiful flower arrangements and unique flower vases? Are you looking for online gifts for your special someone? Are you looking for cake delivery, balloon delivery, chocolate delivery, cheap gifts, a plant shop, rose arrangements, or fresh flowers? Floward UK is the best choice to buy and send gifts – an online flower shop that will amaze you!


Buy a gift and send flowers online with Floward and choose us as your main gift company and your constant online flower delivery shop for all future occasions!


Download our gifts & flowers shop app, make an order, and get it delivered the same day! Buy a flower, send a gift - Enjoy arrangements made by our florists!

description:
Free yourself from the daily, time-consuming house chores and use justclean to book cleaning services. Schedule once, weekly, or bi-weekly - the choice is yours. 

 
With a single sign-on, get access to multiple cleaning services under one app and enjoy your time to live freely. Get more from the app through JC credit bundles, where you get 25% extra credit for free to be used towards the services.

Here is what we offer on the justclean app to make your life easier every day. 

- Laundry collection 
- Home cleaning 
- Mobile car wash 
- Car wash station  
- Male hair barbers (at home) 
- Male hair barbers (at the barbers) 
- Female Hair salons (at home) 
- Female Hair salons (at the boutique) 
- Male spas (at home) 
- Male spas (at the spa) 
- Female spas (at home) 
- Female spas (at the spa) 
- Mobile nail station 
- Pets grooming 
 
justclean credit packages 
A payment option that covers them all. Select from the bundles offered in the app and get 25% extra credit for free instantly. 

At justclean, our mission is to provide you with an easy way of booking cleaning services not just for your clothes but your surroundings at a tap of a button. It is an experience tailored to your needs and we work continuously to make sure you get nothing but the best of everything. Leave the daily chores to us and live your life the way you want - chores free.

developer: CITY POINTS LOYALTY CARD SERVICES L.L.C
description:
Welcome to BOUNZ, the UAE’s most rewarding loyalty program app. BOUNZ makes every purchase extra rewarding. What does that mean? Through BOUNZ, you earn and redeem BOUNZ (points) on each purchase you make from over 40 beloved brands across 100+ outlets.
From everyday spending on groceries to online and offline interactions, virtually every action rewards you. It's a win-win situation.
 
All you need to do is download the BOUNZ app! You can register and join the app for free, and redeem your BOUNZ (points) without any minimum redemption limit.
 
Now, the big question: How do I earn BOUNZ? It's simple. Follow these steps, and you're on your way to collecting the rewards awaiting you.
Step 1: Download the BOUNZ app
Step 2: Register with your mobile number (non-UAE/international numbers  can register as well)
Step 3: Start collecting BOUNZ (points) with each purchase you make at our partner stores.
 
Our Partners
BOUNZ is partnered with the best in the UAE, covering every shopping spectrum from groceries to jewellery, dining, travel, insurance, and much more.
Partner Brands: Choithrams, Emirates Draw, Joyalukkas, Al Jaber Optical, Smiles, EROS Electronics, Gulf News, Elevate Trips, Asha’s Restaurant, Insurancemarket.ae , FinBuddys, Gates Hospitality, Marhaba, N Gopaldaas Jewellers, Groene Point, Menakart, and Noor Water.
 
Features of the BOUNZ app:
Apart from collecting and redeeming points, you can manage your accounts, view past transactions, and check for points accrual history.
 
You can also redeem your BOUNZ to purchase gift cards online, book flight tickets, make hotel reservations, or use other travel packages. With the BOUNZ app, you can manage everything through a single program without the hassle of maintaining multiple loyalty cards.
 
As a data-driven app, BOUNZ users receive tailor-made discounts, offers, and promotions based on their purchase and transaction history, making it easy for users to stay up-to-date.
Newer features include a daily Spin-The-Wheel game (which promises a win for everybody, every time!).
 
The Steps Tracker is another recent addition that allows you to connect the app with your mobile health app and smart devices. Keep a count of your steps, cover the required number of daily steps, and earn rewards!
To top it all off, explore the rewards exchange feature within the app where you can convert your Smiles Points to BOUNZ to further redeem attractive discounts.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms
Visit: https://www.tinderlove.com/

Discover a world of unbeatable savings with the ENTERTAINER. Say farewell to paying in full and unlock buy one get one free offers at the best restaurants, bars, attractions, leisure activities, spas, salons, retail, services, hotel stays and more - across your country.

We offer an annual membership in the following countries – the UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Kuwait and Singapore – plus a GCC product that covers the whole region.

How it works

• Our offers are always buy one get one free – for example in a casual dining restaurant you can buy one Main Course and get a second Main Course for free.

• You get three core offers per merchant – plus non-depleting Monthly Bonus Offers.

• All offers can be used 7 days a week – minimal exclusion days apply.

• A maximum of 4 Buy One Get One Free Offers can be redeemed at one time for a group of 8 people or more.

Here’s why you’ll love the ENTERTAINER

• Always Buy One Get One Free - our core value proposition is the best value offer in the market – allowing our Members access to substantial savings on dining, entertainment, wellness and more – every single day.

• Monthly offers – from brunches to pamper packages – these bonus offers are available exclusively to ENTERTAINER members.

• Share the experiences and the savings – you can share your app with up to 3 family members.

• Easily find the offers you want – location-based search by category, area, cuisine and more.

• Track how much you save – with opportunities to save everyday, it really does add up and our savings calculator will show you how much you and your family save in a year.


The ENTERTAINER helps you save many, discover new experiences and enhances your everyday lifestyle.


Download the app today and join our family of over 4 million happy savers across and get ready for a thrilling year of savings!


If you’re a first-time user and you’re not sure what to go for, you can sign up to our 30 Day Free Trial, which gives you the opportunity to try 2 offers from a selection of merchants. Got a question? Get in touch at customerservice@theentertainerme.com – we’d love to help you.

developer: Hangzhou Dong Bin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
The DMSS app can enhance your security management efficiency. You can watch real-time surveillance videos and play them back anytime, anywhere, via Wi-Fi or cellular networks. If a device alarm is triggered, DMSS will immediately push an instant notification to you.

DMSS offers：
1. Real-time Live View：
You can view real-time surveillance videos from the added devices anytime, anywhere, to help you better monitor the safety of your home environment.

2. Video Playback：
You can quickly find the events you care about by date and event category, and playback the required historical video footage.

3. Instant Alarm Notifications：
You can subscribe to different alarm events according to your needs.  When an event is triggered, you will immediately receive the message notification.

4. Device Sharing
You can share the device with family members for shared use and assign them different usage permissions.

5. Alarm Hub
You can add a variety of peripheral accessories to the alarm hub to provide warnings for potential theft, intrusion, fire, water damage, and other situations. In case of an unforeseen event, DMSS can immediately activate alarms and send out danger notifications.

6. Visual Intercom
You can add visual intercom devices to engage in video calls between the device and the DMSS, as well as perform functions like locking and unlocking.

7. Access Control
You can add access control devices to check the current status of doors and view unlock records, as well as perform remote unlocking operations on the doors.

SmartLife is a smart device management App for you to control and manage your intelligent home products easier and to live smarter. 

SmartLife has integrated with HealthKit. It allows you to seamlessly connect your health records using the body fat scale to Apple Health, where BMI, weight, height, fat percentage, and more can be found in Apple Health's body measurements, giving you a clear and comprehensive picture of your health. You'll need to enable health privacy permissions for Smart Life.

Baity App is your digital property advisor in Bahrain. Discover more than 10,000 properties and key housing project listed by partnered agencies and developers, virtually visit them with Baity 360, save and compare your favorites, calculate and apply for financing via MoHUP financing programs and 8 partner banks with Baity Finance.
Some of our key features:
- Explore: Discover more than 10,000 properties, including plots, villas, and apartments, listed by agencies and developers via Baity’s property list and interactive map.
- Baity 360: Virtually explore properties directly from the app.
- Baity Finance: Calculate and apply for financing via MoHUP Financing Programs (Mazaya, Tasheel) and 8 partner banks.
- Baity Compare: Save and compare your favorite properties using Baity's Smart compare table.
- Baity Projects: Explore and view key listed housing projects by prominent developers in Bahrain through Baity's Interactive Masterplan.
- Consultation: Communicate with our support team directly via the app for a consultation session to guide and assist you in your homeownership experience. Experience a seamless property ownership with Baity!
تطبيق بيتي هو مستشارك العقاري الرقمي في مملكة البحرين. تصفح أكثر من 10,000 عقار ومشاريع سكنية مدرجة من قبل مكاتب ومطورين عقارين، قم بزيارة افتراضيًا لعقاراتك المفضلة باستخدام خاصية بيتي 360، احفظ وقارن عقاراتك المفضلة، قم بحساب وتقديم على طلب تمويل من خلال برامج التمويلات الإسكانية التابعة لوزارة الإسكان والتخطيط العمراني وتمويلات إضافية من قبل البنوك الممولة من خلال خاصية تمويل بيتي.
بعض الخاصيات المميزة:
•⁠  ⁠عقارات متنوعة: تصفح أكثر من 10,000 عقار، بما في ذلك الأراضي والفلل والشقق، المدرجة من قبل المكاتب والمطورين العقارين عبر قائمة العقارات والخريطة التفاعلية في التطبيق.
•⁠  ⁠بيتي 360: قم بزيارة العقارات افتراضيًا من مكانك بكل بساطة.
•⁠  ⁠تمويل بيتي: قم بحساب والتقديم على طلب تمويل من خلال برامج التمويلات الإسكانية التابعة لوزارة الإسكان والتخطيط العمراني وتمويلات إضافية من قبل البنوك الممولة.
•⁠  ⁠قارن بيتي: قم بحفظ ومقارنة عقاراتك المفضلة بشكل تفصيلي.
•⁠  ⁠مشاريع بيتي: تصفح واطلع على أحدث المشاريع السكنية من قبل أبرز المطورين العقارين في مملكة البحرين مع خاصية الخريطة التفاعلية للمشاريع.
•⁠  ⁠الاستشارة: تواصل مع فريق الدعم بشكل مباشر من خلال التطبيق لطلب الإستشارة والتوجيه لمساعدتك في تجربة امتلاك منزلك.
تمتع مع تجربة سهلة وحديثة لامتلاك عقارك مع بيتي!

استمتع الآن بتجربة جديدة كليًا من شكرًا!

قمنا بتغيير كامل لتصميم التطبيق الخاص بنا مع واجهة مستخدم جديدة أبسط وأكثر حداثة وملاءمة من أي وقت مضى.

أكثر بساطة

* تصفح بسرعة ويسر مع قائمة شريط تبويب سهلة الاستخدام
* استمتع بعروض وخصومات وفاعليات في المتاجر الأقرب إليك
* احسب بسهولة نقاط شكرنز التي يمكن أن تكسبها أو تنفقها في العلامات التجارية المفضلة لك في كل الأوقات حتى أثناء فترات التخفيضات.

مزيد من الأمان

* Face ID أو Touch ID  قم بتسجيل الدخول بسهولة وأمان مع ميزة 
* استمتع بمزيد من الأمان الرقمي مع تكنولوجيا ضد الاحتيال

فائدة أكبر بكثير

* استقبل قسائم خصم وعروضًا حصرية مباشرة على شاشة هاتفك الرئيسية
* لمزيد من الراحة Apple Wallet أضف بطاقة شكرًا الخاصة بك إلى
* اطّلع على إيصالاتك ومعاملاتك بكل سهولة
* استخدم صندوق بريد الوارد لإرسال ملاحظاتك إلى شكرًا على الفور ولتلقي عروض رائعة 
* تحكم في خياراتك المفضلة للتواصل معك عبر الإيميل والرسائل النصية والإشعارات في لحظات من خلال ميزة "حسابي" الخاص بك

طفشان؟ تبغى تسولف؟ 
وصلت للمكان الصح، فضفض هو الحل!

مميزات التطبيق:
-  تصميم بسيط بأداء سريع ومذهل
- خصوصيتك محفوظة وجميع محادثاتك مشفّرة
- بيئة آمنة يحظر فيها المستخدمين السيئين وتتوفر فيها إمكانية الإبلاغ عنهم

يمكنك الاشتراك في الباقة الملكية والحصول على التالي:
- الظهور بشكل مميز للآخرين
- البحث في دول محددة حسب رغبتك
- إرسال الصور المتحركة
- إزالة الإعلانات

يوجد خيارين للاشتراك:
- اشتراك شهري بقيمة ٤٩,٩٩ ريال سعودي
- اشتراك ٣ أشهر بقيمة ٧٤,٩٩ ريال سعودي

DESCRIPTION :
       Loyale is a mobile app that connects merchants with their customers. It simplifies adoption of loyalty systems by providing an amazing experience which gathers all types of loyalty schemes and rewards. 

	You will collect points, cash, stamps and will be able to redeem what you collected when you reach a specific balance amount. You will enjoy other features of the app such as watching rewarded videos and adding    favorite merchant cards to your wallet, and many other up to date features.

 KEY FEATURES :
* You will get your customized profile.
* You will receive points, cash, or stamp collection after visiting any merchant.
*  You can redeem points, cash, stamps, offers & flash deals.
*  You will receive rewards by watching videos.
*  You can view your history, total savings and weekly activity.
*  You can scroll and search for customers by searching in categories, filtering and  sorting.
*  You can open a merchant's page to view your transactions, offers, or flash deals   related to this merchant and to see the contact info of that merchant.
*  You can add your favorite merchant cards to your favorites wallet.

 - Book a service visit from a professional engineer for an accurate diagnosis and inspection.

 - Access a range of content, including function descriptions and essential usage solutions for products.

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information 

• Photo, Media, File
- To use the smartphone's storage when downloading the information of the product to be connected
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product.
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.
- To use in “Chat with LG” to save photos/videos of product symptoms or proof of purchase
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information

• Media and Apple Music
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.

• Microphone
- To check product status via Smart Diagnosis
- To use in “Chat with LG” when inputting through the microphone in the input window and using STT.

• Local Network
- To obtain the device connecting Wi-Fi info when adding devices

• Bluetooth
- To find and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices when adding a product to the app.

• HomeKit
- To add IoT-based products

• Notifications
- Notifications are essential for receiving updates on product status, important notices, benefits, and information.

Points by NBB is a rewards program designed especially for NBB customers, tailored to their preferences and lifestyle. It rewards them for Card spending and other activities, offering a variety of redemption options.
NBB customers can log into Points App simply by using their existing NBB Digital Banking username and password. They will earn points for various financial and non-financial activities, as well as special occasions. Additionally, customers can accumulate points collectively through a household account, enabling the entire family to accelerate the earning and redemption process.




Points rewards come in two types:




1. Base Points: Earned through Credit and Prepaid Card spending.* 
2. Bonus Points: Earned through other activities.*




How can I earn points on the Points App?




1. Spend with NBB Credit and Prepaid Cards.
2. Apply and get the Card that suits you through NBB Digital Banking App.
3. Complete your profile to receive rewards on your next login.
4. Respond to surveys.
5. Earn points on special occasions.
6. Participate in Points challenges and earn points.




What can I redeem my points for?


1. Base Points:
◦ Cashback: Each 100 Base Points is equivalent to BHD 1, minimum amount to cashback is 1,000 Base Points.
◦ Donate your points to charity.




2. Bonus and Base Points:

◦ Participate in raffles and get a chance to win valuable prizes.
On top of that, you will have exclusive access to many exciting offers and promotions prepared just for you!




Raffles Disclaimer:

All raffles are monitored, and the draws will be attended by a representative from the Bahraini Ministry of Industry and Commerce.
Points’ members can redeem their points against unlimited raffle tickets using their Base or Bonus points at the announced ticket value. Winners will be announced and notified via email, SMS, and an in-app notification immediately after the draw, they will also be contacted by an NBB employee to arrange for the prize collection or delivery.
All raffles are sponsored and processed exclusively by the National Bank of Bahrain.




*Debit Cards also earn points with specific offers. Find out more about the offers section in Points by NBB App.

- Cancel renewal:If you cancel the renewal, please manually turn off the automatic renewal function in the iTunes/AppleID settings management 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. Cultivate a gratitude routine, seize wonderful moments, and let a positive mindset become your daily staple.

Joylog is a gratitude-tracking app crafted for contemporary life, aiming to assist you in nurturing a positive attitude and treasuring life's lovely moments amid your bustling schedule.

Core Features
- Gratitude Recording: Jot down the people, events, and objects you're grateful for each day using text and photos.
- Mood Labeling: Utilize a diverse collection of emojis and tags to accurately convey your current mood.
- Chronology: Look back on your gratitude path via a sleek calendar display.
- Intelligent Analysis: Turn data into visuals to observe the growth of your positive mindset.
- Customization: Toggle between light and dark themes to craft your one-of-a-kind recording space.
- Privacy Safeguard: Local data storage guarantees that all your gratitude records stay entirely private and secure.

Ideal for
- People wanting to develop a positive mindset.
- Users who like to document their lives.
- Modern individuals striving for a mindful way of life.
- Anyone hoping to boost their happiness.
